dct_title_s: The description of the Holy Land
dct_description_sm: Index: The places specified in the Mappe...
Decorative border with latitudinal and longitudinal markings.
Probably drawn after the Geneva Bible, 1560.
Probably drawn after Guillaume Postel's map.
Appears in Barker's The New Testament, 1595.
